'''Chatter Between Roots''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Forest of Jnana and Vidya]]''.

In [[Devantaka Mountain]], the soundtrack plays in the cave behind the [[Ruin Golem (Devantaka Mountain)|Ruin Golem]].

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 77]].
